venue.name: New Britain Museum of American Art

item.description:
If you're not going to the Naugatuck party...several Meetups are going here, come on along to the New Britain Museum of American Art for their 5th Annual M.A.D. Halloween Costume Party!

http://www.nbmaa.org/...

There will be hilarious & scandalous burlesque acts of dancing, singing, and comedy by the Beat City Beauties burlesque troupe.

 http://www.facebook.c...

Also a DJ, dance floor, art exhibitions, costume contest, open bar, and appetizers. Prizes awarded for Most Creative, Best Couple, Best Overall Costume and others.

8pm-11:30pm. $20. Free parking.

HOST: Jason, cell # in RSVP (texting is ok too)
item.name: Fri 10/28 - Halloween party with burlesque, DJ/dancing, art, & open bar
